Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 39-2010. A 19-year-old 
woman with nausea, jaundice, and pruritus.
Friedman LS(1), Gee MS, Misdraji J.

Author information:
(1)Department of Medicine, Massachusetts General Hospital, and Harvard Medical 
School, Boston, MA, USA.

Erratum in
    N Engl J Med. 2011 Nov 17;365(20):1944.
